item.description:
JOIN US for Boston Zumba on Thursday Nights!

6:30–7:30pm at The Sports Club LA/Boston  

Not just a workout...an experience!

Come see what everyone's talking about and what makes a Zumba class with Amy different from all the rest.

At a Zumba Dance with Amy class, you get much more than the average Zumba class: you get Amy's OVER 25 YEARS of experience and knowledge in the health and fitness industry, plus an athletic, high-energy, diverse, total body workout that is surprisingly easy to follow and most of all fun to do! If you're looking for a way to get fit, feel inspired, increase your energy, make some friends and lose yourself in the hypnotic music...look no further!

All abilities welcome and encouraged! :)

Open to members or to the public for a Drop-In Rate.

For more details please see: www.zumbadancewithamy.com

*LIKE "Zumba Dance with Amy" on FACEBOOK

DROP-INS ALWAYS WELCOME FOR A DAY RATE!

More at: www.amyfournierhealthandfitness.com  

4 Avery Street at Tremont Boston, MA 02111  617-375-8200 http://www.mpsportsclub.com/clubs/boston/index.php\

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Night Zumba Party!
